mapper.select: SELECT M.MEM_EMAIL MEM_EMAIL, M.MEM_PW MEM_PW, M.MEM_ADDR MEM_ADDR, M.MEM_DET_ADDR MEM_DET_ADDR,M.MEM_NAME MEM_NAME ,M.MEM_FM_REQ MEM_FM_REQ , M.MEM_TEL MEM_TEL,L.ROLE_ATHR ROLE_ATHR, M.MEM_ATHR FROM MEMBER M JOIN MEM_ATHR_LIST L ON (M.MEM_ATHR = L.MEM_ATHR) WHERE MEM_EMAIL = #{mem_email}

SELECT MEM_EMAIL , MEM_NAME , CASE WHEN MEM_ATHR = 'B1' THEN '일반회원' WHEN MEM_ATHR = 'B2' THEN '농부' WHEN MEM_ATHR = 'B0' THEN '관리자' END MEM_ATHR , NVL(MEM_FM_REQ, ' ') MEM_FM_REQ , CASE WHEN MEM_ATHR = 'B2' THEN '농부' WHEN MEM_ATHR ='B1' AND MEM_FM_REQ = 'Reject' THEN '거절됨' WHEN MEM_ATHR = 'B1' AND MEM_FM_REQ IS NOT NULL THEN '신청중' ELSE ' ' END MEM_FM_RESULT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_EMAIL NOT LIKE 'admin%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_EMAIL, MEM_PW, MEM_ADDR, MEM_DET_ADDR, MEM_NAME, MEM_ATHR, MEM_TEL) VALUES(#{mem_email}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_addr}, #{mem_det_addr}, #{mem_name}, 'B1', #{mem_tel})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE 1 = 1 WHERE MEM_EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{val} || '%' WHERE MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{val} || '%'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PW = #{mem_pw}, MEM_ADDR = #{mem_addr}, MEM_DET_ADDR = #{mem_det_addr}, MEM_TEL = #{mem_tel} WHERE MEM_EMAIL = #{mem_email}
